question:
Kaylum can’t bear playing the oboe. Elyan eschews baking bread. Hamid adores botany. Ehsen neglects zoology. Cayden-Robert abhors fruit salad. Jiao is neutral toward stir-fry. Precious finds fulfillment in gliders. Subhaan admires archaeology. Youssef endorses vintage cars. Gus waves away filmmaking. Crombie ignores chopping vegetables. Steven welcomes trucks. Rhyse reveres penguins. Aazaan longs for playing the oboe. Jarvi bemoans visiting theme parks. Alishan exults podcasting. Rhett overlooks literature. Deshawn worships candy. Edward is devoted to playing hockey. Roary values airplanes. Lucian ignores virtual reality. Dorian despises curry. Keiran bemoans crocheting. Karson despises wisdom. Cesar fancies history. Braeden is keen on balloons. Sofian ignores skiing. Ihtisham favors playing flute. Saul finds satisfaction in the color magenta. Pawlo waves away the color salmon. Ethan finds fulfillment in reading mystery novels. Garrett is committed to butterflies. Edwyn finds fulfillment in roadsters. Barry disdains folklore. Blazej values squirrels. Ennis is partial to the color magenta. Sultan exults ferries. Mustafa detests steak. Vasyl tolerates cleaning the ceiling fan. Seonaidh can’t bear simplicity. Benny fancies submarines. Cadyn scoffs at segways. 
Who longs for playing the oboe? Reply with a name enclosed within triple angle brackets, like <<<name>>>.
